description: Try our easy to follow Waffles With Nutella, Banana And Crushed Hazelnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Waffles With Nutella, Banana And Crushed Hazelnuts
name: Waffles With Nutella, Banana And Crushed Hazelnuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Open the pan, invert the waffle onto the racklined baking sheet and let cool for 2 to 3 minutes before serving. Repeat with the remaining batter. Spread the waffles with hazulnut chocolate spread and top with banana and crushed hazelnuts to serve.
